修改不会报错，如果是新增或者删除的话，这个迭代会报错。 这里不加锁很大的原因在于10S执行一次很频繁的，如果这个时候真的有添加的话报错的话也没事儿。我感觉应该更多的考虑是扫描发现不可用的概率非常低。

> 修改不会报错，如果是新增或者删除的话，这个迭代会报错。 这里不加锁很大的原因在于10S执行一次很频繁的，如果这个时候真的有添加的话报错的话也没事儿。我感觉应该更多的考虑是扫描发现不可用的概率非常低。

这里是否可以考虑使用ConcurrentHashMap?
@jayden88 The feature acl have already been merged.You can see the codes in the 4.4.0 version of RocketMQ.

The exception already tells you the reason: ClassNotFoundException. Class RocketmqLogbackAppender is defined in logappender module.
try add dependency:
         `<dependency>`
            `<groupId>org.apache.rocketmq</groupId>`
            `<artifactId>rocketmq-logappender</artifactId>`
        `</dependency>`
@vongosling Year,it is the same as RIP-9.

Notice the line 175. When configureBlocking is true, the connect() will blocking until the connection established or timeout. But if configureBlocking is false, we should use socketChannel#finishConnect() to check whether the connection is established, it will bring additional work. So, i think in line 170, it make sure the  socketChannel is blocking before connect() is invoked.
迭代过程中，如果HashMap中元素有增或删，确实会直接报错，并影响下次调度。由于执行得不频繁，并且broker机器变化也不频繁，因此很少会报错。这块代码确实需要优化一下，做个try catch或者使用ConcurrentHashMap，都可以解决问题。
I think you are right. But it only occur in extreme condition, and has no effect on other logic. If you are interest in this, i suggest you propose a PR to optimize it.

> 迭代过程中，如果HashMap中元素有增或删，确实会直接报错，并影响下次调度。由于执行得不频繁，并且broker机器变化也不频繁，因此很少会报错。这块代码确实需要优化一下，做个try catch或者使用ConcurrentHashMap，都可以解决问题。

> checkpoint已经有了

consumer queue and commit log checkpoint dont work well .
if work well , when restart normally , dont need scan the log file ( but now need scan the log file ) . 
because offset checkpoint can direct point the position
如果每个topic的consume queue都保存offset的话, 那么1万个topic,每个topic假设4个队列,那么需要至少4万个long, 那么这部分的写肯定是随机写了，这样有可能会影响性能，并且现在的正常情况下扫描文件，大部分情况是为了预热,当然也有文件校验的设计在里面。
@heheshang We will merge the develop branch to master after 4.4.0 released, please wait for a moment.
@wlliqipeng All Error Is Correct!
@ilyaukin please go to rocketmq-client-python repo
to fix #711
I think, first you can check the broker's log, to make sure whether the dispatch is behind the commit log too much.

> 如果每个topic的consume queue都保存offset的话, 那么1万个topic,每个topic假设4个队列,那么需要至少4万个long, 那么这部分的写肯定是随机写了，这样有可能会影响性能，并且现在的正常情况下扫描文件，大部分情况是为了预热,当然也有文件校验的设计在里面。

4 0000 long write a file , sync periodic to file dont have a problem.   like consumer offset . 
Other ,  kafka every partition have a checkpoint offset ( A file name recovery-point-offset-checkpoint )

Also , if 10000 topic , if need scan log file ,restart broker  cost how mush time ? 
 10 minute ? even more ??

你说的先放在内存，然后定时刷盘，从技术上是可以的，反正已经有了很多元数据的刷盘，多一个也是没有问题的，我认为，我说的随机写，是指如果还是用mmap的方式来更新，至于scan耗时的问题，如果不在启动的时候读进来，那么就会在真正发送和消费消息的时候去读，那么假如在scan的过程中需要发10分钟，那么读取的总时间还是10分钟，那么在发送和消费消息的时候，这10分钟就会散落在发送和消费消息的过程中，那么就会造成消息有波动，所以我认为提前预热是可以的，但是也许把恢复和预热分开，这样设计会更好。
如果保存了每个concume queue的offset，那么这个offset还是不一定能用，因为consume offset最终还是要索引到commitlog,假如commitlog 没有对应的数据，那么consume queue保存的这个offset也没有意义，所以最终就算有了这个offset，还是要根据commitlog来修复一遍，因为他们不是一起刷盘的。

@mm23504570 As you described in this issue, you deployed the RocketMQ broker in a 8 core cpu server, but as the log showed, there are more than 48 sendMessageThread in config, and as RocketMQ used spinlock as default, so you can try to adjust  the sendMessageThread num to 8 to prevent more thread was blocked to obtain the spinlock, and this also will decrease you cpu utility.

And please pay more attention to your memory usage especially cache usage, please reserve relative more free memory for RocketMQ.
@gaoyf Consumer with Broadcasting model used local offsetStore to store offset， so please give the file write permission in using RocketMQ.

@superheizai This is really a place can be optimized, because in the following code it only checked the topic's perm config of the first broker whether same as the perm value to be set, so could you pull a request to polish this implementation? we are happy to help you to complete this PR.
@duhenglucky yes, i can give the write permission, but i cannot prevent the disk becoming broken!
ok, I will make a PR for it

I met the same issue this morning, haven't got a solution for it. The issue is not reproducable for now. But it may occur after.

I'm running RMQ in a 2 core cpu server. And I've changed the default spinlock to reentrantLock. 

```
sendMessageThreadPoolNums=128
useReentrantLockWhenPutMessage=true
waitTimeMillsInSendQueue=1000
defaultTopicQueueNums=16
```

After I changed the conf , the problem still exists.  
```
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_8 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3019, bodyLength=520
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_3 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3023, bodyLength=70
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_7 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3019, bodyLength=115
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN ScheduleMessageTimerThread - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3021, bodyLength=100
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_6 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3025, bodyLength=111
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_2 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3023, bodyLength=70
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_5 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3018, bodyLength=69
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_4 - [NOTIFYME]putMessage in lock cost time(ms)=3024, bodyLength=100 AppendMessageResult=AppendMessageResult{status=PUT_OK, wroteOffset=3972957994955, wroteBytes=559, msgId='0A01002B00002A9F0000039D06BFFFCB', storeTimestamp=1548681721361, logicsOffset=261429845, pagecacheRT=3024, msgNum=1}
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_4 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3025, bodyLength=100
2019-01-28 21:22:04 WARN SendMessageThread_1 - putMessage not in lock eclipse time(ms)=3011, bodyLength=173
```
36G cache 

```
free -m
              total        used        free      shared  buff/cache   available
Mem:          48139       11522         295         309       36321       35817
Swap:             0           0           0
```

我遇到了类似的问题，参考如下：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10137071/51880442-3a410000-23b2-11e9-8517-bdc0694425f7.png)

我参考服务器配置把broker配置修改了如下几项，就好了：
```
sendMessageThreadPoolNums=48
useReentrantLockWhenPutMessage=true
waitTimeMillsInSendQueue=500
```
